Name: the Vesper Marches
Description: The Vesper Marches is a nation established in March 3151 within the former Clan Jade Falcon Occupation Zone. Founded by Duke Vedet Brewer, the Marches emerged following Brewer's departure from the Lyran Commonwealth and his subsequent takeover of Melissia, which became the capital of his new realm. Initially, its military strength centered around the First Hesperus Guards, with later expansions incorporating noble personal armies. Politically, the Vesper Marches function as Brewer's personal domain, maintained through alliances with Melissia's noble families. Economically, the nation benefits from corporate support on Medellin and trade relations with the Free Guilds of the Malthus Confederation.
ReputationStatements: I often wonder why Duke Brewer extends contracts to mercenaries, Commander, but alas, even the Vesper Marches occasionally requires blunt instruments. Complete this task well, and we may see your value rise to meet our high standards.
Greetings, mercenary. Though you stand far below the nobility of the Vesper Marches, even lesser tools have their place. Finish this contract, and perhaps we'll grant you a touch of Brewer's favor.
The Vesper Marches have uses for mercenaries, Commander, and your reputation suggests you may fulfill them. This contract awaits your consideration, and I expect a professional result.
Commander, Duke Brewer himself deigns to offer this opportunity to you. The terms are fair and fitting, especially for a mercenary outfit like yours. Consider it carefully.
Commander, the Vesper Marches require proven talent, and you have caught our attention. We extend this contract in respect of your capabilities. Do not disappoint us.
Greetings, Commander. Few have the distinction of repeated service to the Vesper Marches, but you have earned that honor. This task is vital, and we trust you will handle it with your usual skill.

Commander, your efforts have proven indispensable to Duke Brewer's plans. Once again, the Vesper Marches calls upon you for a task only a trusted ally could perform. Accept it, and our gratitude will match your compensation.
MissionSuccessStatements: Excellent work, Commander. The Vesper Marches recognizes your success, and your payment has already been transferred. We look forward to your continued service.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: While you failed to complete the primary objective, the Vesper Marches acknowledges the effort you made. Partial payment has been issued, but know that Duke Brewer values results above all.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, your failure reflects poorly on your abilities. The Vesper Marches does not tolerate incompetence, and no payment will be issued for such an inadequate performance.
